question: 唱歌
sourceMnemonic: You're <kanji>chant</kanji>ing and you're <kanji>sing</kanji>ing and you're having a gay ol' time. You're <vocabulary>singing</vocabulary> all your <vocabulary>songs</vocabulary> and even the chanting sounds like singing. It's so fun.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
